references.paper_title: Fair Bilevel Neural Network (FairBiNN): On Balancing fairness and accuracy via Stackelberg Equilibrium
references.reason: This is the main research paper, introducing the FairBiNN method and its theoretical foundation.

references.paper_title: Equality of opportunity in supervised learning
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the fairness-in-machine-learning field, introducing the concept of equality of opportunity.

references.paper_title: Fairness beyond disparate treatment & disparate impact: Learning classification without disparate mistreatment
references.reason: This paper extends the traditional notions of fairness to include disparate mistreatment, providing a more nuanced perspective.
This paper introduces the concept of individual fairness, a crucial element in understanding different types of fairness.

references.paper_title: Data decisions and theoretical implications when adversarially learning fair representations
references.reason: This paper explores the use of adversarial training to achieve fairness, a prominent technique in the field.
